005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticMetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.ServiceLoader;
012import java.util.ServiceLoader.Provider;
013import java.util.stream.Stream;
014
015import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
019
020public final class FunctionService {
021  private static final Lazy<FunctionService> INSTANCE = Lazy.lazy(() -> new FunctionService());
022  @NonNull
023  private final ServiceLoader<IFunctionLibrary> loader;
024  @NonNull
025  private final Lazy<IFunctionLibrary> library;
026
027  /**
028   * Get the singleton instance of the function service.
029   *
030   * @return the service instance
031   */
032  public static FunctionService getInstance() {
033    return INSTANCE.get();
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new function service.
038   */
039  @SuppressWarnings("null")
040  public FunctionService() {
041    this.loader = ServiceLoader.load(IFunctionLibrary.class);
042    ServiceLoader<IFunctionLibrary> loader = getLoader();
043
044    this.library = Lazy.lazy(() -> {
045      FunctionLibrary functionLibrary = new FunctionLibrary();
046      loader.stream()
047          .map(Provider<IFunctionLibrary>::get)
048          .flatMap(IFunctionLibrary::stream)
049          .forEachOrdered(function -> functionLibrary.registerFunction(ObjectUtils.notNull(function)));
050      return functionLibrary;
051    });
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Get the function service loader instance.
056   *
057   * @return the service loader instance.
058   */
059  @NonNull
060  private ServiceLoader<IFunctionLibrary> getLoader() {
061    return loader;
062  }
063
064  @NonNull
065  private IFunctionLibrary getLibrary() {
066    return ObjectUtils.notNull(library.get());
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Retrieve the collection of function signatures in this library as a stream.
071   *
072   * @return a stream of function signatures
073   */
074  public Stream<IFunction> stream() {
075    return getLibrary().stream();
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Retrieve the function with the provided name that supports the signature of
080   * the provided methods, if such a function exists.
081   *
082   * @param name
083   *          the name of a group of functions
084   * @param arity
085   *          the count of arguments for use in determining an argument signature
086   *          match
087   * @return the matching function or {@code null} if no match exists
088   * @throws StaticMetapathException
089   *           if a matching function was not found
090   */
091  public IFunction getFunction(@NonNull String name, int arity) {
092    IFunction retval;
093    synchronized (this) {
094      retval = getLibrary().getFunction(name, arity);
095    }
096
097    if (retval == null) {
098      throw new StaticMetapathException(StaticMetapathException.NO_FUNCTION_MATCH,
099          String.format("unable to find function with name '%s' having arity '%d'", name, arity));
100    }
101    return retval;
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Retrieve the function with the provided name that supports the signature of
106   * the provided methods, if such a function exists.
107   *
108   * @param name
109   *          the name of a group of functions
110   * @param arity
111   *          the count of arguments for use in determining an argument signature
112   *          match
113   * @return the matching function or {@code null} if no match exists
114   * @throws StaticMetapathException
115   *           if a matching function was not found
116   */
117  public IFunction getFunction(@NonNull QName name, int arity) {
118    IFunction retval;
119    synchronized (this) {
120      retval = getLibrary().getFunction(name, arity);
121    }
122
123    if (retval == null) {
124      throw new StaticMetapathException(StaticMetapathException.NO_FUNCTION_MATCH,
125          String.format("unable to find function with name '%s' having arity '%d'", name, arity));
126    }
127    return retval;
128  }
129
130}
